sentences.en: Apply pipe dope sparingly on pipe threads, never on valve threads.
sentences.cn: 在管道螺纹上涂敷螺纹油, 但是不要在阀门螺纹上涂螺纹油.

sentences.en: Dessert is high in calories and sugar. Use Sparingly.
sentences.cn: 甜点是热量最高的含醣食物, 常含大量脂肪,必须限量吃.

sentences.en: If need be, be mostly silent or speak sparingly.
sentences.cn: 如果需要, 最好保持静默或言简意赅.

sentences.en: Maltose is used sparingly as a mild sweetener for foods.
sentences.cn: 麦芽糖可以作为食品中温和的甜味剂而少量使用.

sentences.en: Planning permission is handed out sparingly.
sentences.cn: 建筑许可证的发放是很谨慎的。

sentences.en: Prune your tree sparingly, unless the wood is dead or damaged.
sentences.cn: 保守地修剪你的果树, 除非枝条已经坏死或者损伤.

sentences.en: Sweeten dishes sparingly with honey, or con-centrated apple or pear juice.
sentences.cn: 加一点蜂蜜或浓缩苹果汁或梨汁，让菜带点甜味。

sentences.en: The lotion should be applied sparingly to the skin.
sentences.cn: 这种洗液应均匀地涂在皮肤上.

sentences.en: This expensive spice was used only sparingly in cooking.
sentences.cn: 这种价格不菲的调味品仅是用来烹调时节省地使用.

sentences.en: This paint is very expensive, so please use it sparingly.
sentences.cn: 这种涂料很贵，请省着点用。

sentences.en: This paint is very expensive, so please use It'sparingly.
sentences.cn: 这种塗料很贵, 请省着点用.

sentences.en: Use the milk sparingly, there is not much left.
sentences.cn: 少用些牛奶, 剩下的不多了.
这种香料只要用一点点。
